sentences: Chris Flory (born November 13, 1953) is an American jazz guitarist.
Flory began playing professionally in Providence, Rhode Island, in the 1970s.

He played with Benny Goodman from 1979 to 1985, toured throughout China in 1992, and among his other credits include work with Ruby Braff, Judy Carmichael, Roy Eldridge, Scott Hamilton, Illinois Jacquet, Buddy Tate, and Bob Wilber.
